alert.note: Alert for Clarendon (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 1:39PM EDT until May 27 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Clarendon County in central South Carolina... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 139 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles west of Hebron, or 12 miles northeast of Manning, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Turbeville and Gable. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 129 and 134. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
